memberdef.argsstring: (const State< Q > &Psi, double Lambda, const fRG_config &config) -> State< Q >
memberdef.name: rhs_n_loop_flow

memberdef.argsstring: (SelfEnergy< Q > &dPsiSelfEnergy, const Vertex< Q, false > &PsiVertex, const Propagator< Q > &S)
memberdef.name: selfEnergyOneLoopFlow

memberdef.argsstring: (Vertex< Q, true > &dPsiVertex, const Vertex< Q, false > &Psi, const Bubble_Object &dPi, const fRG_config &config)
memberdef.name: vertexOneLoopFlow

memberdef.argsstring: (SelfEnergy< Q > &dPsiSelfEnergy, const GeneralVertex< Q, symmetric_r_irred, true > &dGammaC_tbar, const State< Q > &Psi, const Propagator< Q > &G)
memberdef.name: selfEnergyFlowCorrections

detaileddescription.para: The first selfenergy correction is given by dSigma_tbar = G * dGamma_tbar => dGamma_tbar has to be irreducible in the t-channel The second selfenergy correction is dSigma_t = (G dSigma_tbar G) * Gamma

memberdef.argsstring: (const GeneralVertex< Q, symmetric_r_irred, true > &dPsiVertex, const Vertex< Q, false > &PsiVertex, const Bubble_Object &Pi, const fRG_config &config) -> Vertex< Q, true >
memberdef.name: calculate_dGammaL

detaileddescription.para: for dGammaR in channel r we combine: dgammaL_r = dgamma_rbar ◯ Pi_r ◯ Gamma Hence dgamma_rbar only returns values of the r-IRreducible sector

memberdef.argsstring: (const GeneralVertex< Q, symmetric_r_irred, true > &dPsiVertex, const Vertex< Q, false > &PsiVertex, const Bubble_Object &Pi, const fRG_config &config) -> Vertex< Q, true >
memberdef.name: calculate_dGammaR

detaileddescription.para: for dGammaR in channel r we combine: dgammaR_r = Gamma ◯ Pi_r ◯ dgamma_rbar Hence dgamma_rbar only returns values of the r-IRreducible sector

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vertex< Q, false > &PsiVertex, const GeneralVertex< Q, non_symmetric_diffleft, true > &nonsymVertex, const Bubble_Object &Pi, const fRG_config &config) -> Vertex< Q, true >
memberdef.name: calculate_dGammaC_right_insertion

detaileddescription.para: for dGammaC in channel r we combine: dgammaC_r = Gamma ◯ Pi_r ◯ dGammaL_r Hence dGammaL only returns values of the r-reducible sector

memberdef.argsstring: (const GeneralVertex< Q, non_symmetric_diffright, true > &nonsymVertex, const Vertex< Q, false > &PsiVertex, const Bubble_Object &Pi, const fRG_config &config) -> Vertex< Q, true >
memberdef.name: calculate_dGammaC_left_insertion

memberdef.argsstring: (SelfEnergy< Q > &Sigma_out, const State< Q > &Psi, const double Lambda, const fRG_config &config)
memberdef.name: calculate_dSigma_SOPT

memberdef.argsstring: (const State< Q > &Psi, const double Lambda, const int nloops_max, const vec< size_t > opt, const fRG_config &config, mfRG_stats &stats) -> State< Q >
memberdef.name: rhs_n_loop_flow

detaileddescription.para:
Function to implement an n-loop flow (without Katanin substitution).
Psi
: Known state of the State at Lambda
Lambda
Scale at which the calculation is being performed
dPsi : The derivative at Lambda, which includes the differential vertex as well as self-energy at scale Lambda

inbodydescription.para: For flow without self-energy, comment out this line
limit number of states in history?

memberdef.argsstring: (Vertex< Q, true > &dGamma_T, Vertex< Q, true > &dGamma) -> bool
memberdef.name: vertexConvergedInLoops

memberdef.argsstring: (SelfEnergy< Q > &dPsiSelfEnergy, SelfEnergy< Q > &PsiSelfEnergy, Propagator< Q > &dG) -> bool
memberdef.name: selfEnergyConverged
